Posts.EditableText: Hi I'm trying to make a game with a locked door, should I make it a container or an exit? I've tried to make an exit but I want the exit only to unlock when the player uses a certain object on the door
Posts.HTML: Hi I'm trying to make a game with a locked door, should I make it a container or an exit? I've tried to make an exit but I want the exit only to unlock when the player uses a certain object on the door

Posts.EditableText:
Make the exit invisible. Set up an 'if' script. If object is reachable.
 Make exit visible.
Posts.HTML:
Make the exit invisible. Set up an 'if' script. If object is reachable.
Make exit visible.
